column5: You's dreamin! Y'all know the best Whiskey in the WORLD comes from Lynchburg Tennessee!! Canadian Whisky is good, but not the best.Mr Jack
With the exchange rate at what it is I would say any whiskey is a good deal,unless you want it for nothing.
Being that the best whisky in the world comes from north of the border, I was wondering if there is such a thing as getting a good deal during our visit?
I would think the dutie free store might be your best bet.<{{}}><

Gibsons Rye is 12 years old and the best there is. At around $35 Can for 1.14 litres it is a bargain. Nector of the Canadian Walleye Gods. There are no bargains with booze in Canada. Duty free can be just as pricy as the Government outlets.
yes duty free store at the border would be your cheapest...up here it is all regulated by govt. so we don't get the sales that you seem to....
Last Aug I crossed at Pidgon River. A 40 of Dewers Scotch whisky was 17.95. Will be crossing at Int. Falls this Aug. Do they have anything like that there? I surely hope so.
How much is duty on a case of beer?
We didn't check on the price of beer. I do know that we paid 36 Canadian for it in camp. I know that it was a lot, but it was there and it was cold and it wasn't Bud.
Anyone know the hours of the duty free at Intl Falls?
Exchange rate: $1.00US = $1.61CanNow thats a good deal.
I strongly urge any conissiuers of fine canadian whiskey to try PURE GOLD by KR Estate distillery its smooth like crown royal and less $$ .
